page.title: 15FAMILY LIFE II
page.content:
{The Hecks} Only my mum and I are in the house during the week as my dad works away from home, returning at the weekends. My mum gets up at 6:35 - on goes the heating and the coffee. I get up at about 7:00, dressing in my school uniform of blue shirt, blue skirt and maroon jumper. My breakfast is usually Cheese and Ham Toast-Toppers or muesli.
I have a quick look at the paper before getting a lift to the train station with the next door neighbour. It takes about fifteen minutes to walk from Maidstone Station to Invicta Grammar School. On Wednesday's we have an early timetable, lessons starting at 9:00 and finishing at 3:15, but on all other days we start at 9:15 and finish at 3:50. I snack, do my homework,eat, TV & bed.
